note: Elimuhub Tuition Centre and Education Consultants is a registered educational consultant firm based in Nairobi, Kenya². They offer short-term home tutors and part-time after-school tutoring across Kenya, including one-on-one private tutoring in all Nairobi estates². They specialize in a variety of curriculums, including IGCSE, IB, American K-2 Curriculum, British National Curriculum, 8:4:4 and CBC, KCPE, KCSE, and Adult Education². They also provide a free educational assessment. @elimuhub
